This works on Windows 7

There is an instructional video for the installation on a famous internet video hosting site which I can't link here. Search for it.

To instantly install applocale with rightclick shortcuts search Hongfire for "HF pAppLoc"

Now all you need to do is

download game

install applocale with above link (takes 2 seconds)

mount image

rightclick setup -> run in japanese as admin

install game in C/Illusion/Sexy Beach Zero (make sure installation folder is in english letters and NOT in program files or on another drive

during installation mount second image when prompted

download english translation patch (Google it)

run patch

start game

enjoy
